headline: HSY Q1 Earnings Call: Management Addresses Volume Declines, Tariff Uncertainty, and Product Innovation
summary: Chocolate company Hershey (NYSE:HSY) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales fell by 13.8% year on year to $2.81 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.09 per share was 8.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
